product_description: Captivate any room in this stunning Zara Floral Print Midi Dress by Zara. Beautifully crafted from 100% Polyester and Lining: 100% Viscose with meticulous attention to detail. The flattering silhouette and Floral Blue, Floral Pink and Black Print options make this Women dress perfect for Spring/Summer occasions from casual gatherings to formal events.
